dict.acceptation: 有阅历的；有见识的；老练的，熟练的；有经验的，有丰富经验的；

sent.orig: Only really experienced, careful experienced, they would understand this plain truth are indeed the truth.
sent.trans: 只有真正经历过，仔细体会过，才明白平淡是真这句话确实是真理。

sent.orig: Clinton Administration (1993-2000) , China-U.S. relations experienced ups and downs experienced a four-mongering tortuous development process.
sent.trans: 克林顿执政时期（1993年至2000年），中美关系跌宕起伏，经历了四落四起的曲折发展过程。

sent.orig: I am looking for an experienced actionscript professional to help me with a quick problem.
sent.trans: 我正找一个有经验的专业动作，以帮助我快速的问题。

sent.orig: We need capable and experienced hands. Ideas just don't accomplish themselves.
sent.trans: 我们需要有能力和经验的老手，只有想法并不能成事。

sent.orig: Unlike any other creature on this planet, humans can learn and understand, without having experienced.
sent.trans: 人类和在这个星球上的其他生物不同，人类能够在没有自我经历的情况下学习和理解。
